You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesP P] > &para

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&para;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00b6/index.htm U+000B6].
  * `&para` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00b6/index.htm U+000B6].
